attributes.action: Award remaining veterans from World War II at least an MBE for services to UK.
attributes.background: Every  member of HM Forces and supporting services during World War II put their lives on the line in defence of Great Britain.  Every currently surviving veteran should now be awarded at least an MBE for their services and sacrifices to ensuring continued democracy in UK.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
